summary: A rebel girl signs up a group of cheerleaders to help her take down the captain of their high school football team, but a supernatural turn of events thrusts the girls into a different battle.
cast: Sidney Allison|Charon R. Arnold|Shay Astar|Sam Bean|Nicholas Bloom|Nadia Boceski|Michael Bowen|Shane Bowen|Brooke Butler|Amanda Grace Benitez|Felisha Cooper|Brandon Hampton|Jesse Hlubik|Reanin Johannink|Margarito|Mike McKee|Madeleine McSweeney|Nicholas S. title: All cheerleaders die - Todas las cheerleaders muertas
